__TOC__

=== HP (Hewlett Packard) laptops running Ubuntu GNU/Linux, tested by the community ===
<nowiki>[[File:hp_logo.png]]</nowiki>

Check <nowiki>[[LaptopTestingTeam]]</nowiki> for Canonical tested laptops.

Hewlett Packard have a page on <nowiki>[[http://h71028.www7.hp.com/enterprise/cache/309906-0-0-0-121.html?jumpid=reg_R1002_USEN|Open Source and Linux from HP]]</nowiki> and a <nowiki>[[http://h71028.www7.hp.com/enterprise/cache/317504-0-0-0-121.html|Linux certification and support matrix]]</nowiki> focusing on SUSE, Redhat and Mandriva Linux. I'm sure some queries from Ubuntu users would be good for them.

There is also the "forum is for discussing both general and technical issues regarding Linux OS distributions running on or utilizing Hewlett-Packard products." So if you need help check out the <nowiki>[[http://forums1.itrc.hp.com/service/forums/familyhome.do?admit=-682735245+1162060023201+28353475&familyId=118|HP Linux Support Forum]]</nowiki>.
